ajc-test.title: cyclic class inheritance
ajc-test.abccomment: There are two kinds of errors in this program, one due to cyclic inheritance and one due to missing bodies of the constructors. Abc finds the missing bodies, ajc finds the cyclic inheritance. If the bodies are fixed to have a body then abc finds the cyclic inheritance and gives a fine error message. LJH July 2/04
